Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.mapping.ambassador.weighting

Class StochasticSelector<T extends Weighted>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.mapping.ambassador.weighting.StochasticSelector<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the object to be returned
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeightedSelector<T>
    public class StochasticSelector<T extends Weighted>
extends Object
implements WeightedSelector<T>
    Helper class allowing the random and pseudo-random selection of multiple objects. The distribution can be defined by weights.
